Containers.Name: davfs2 filesystem
Containers.Description:
This plugin provides the ability to mount davfs filesystems under Unraid.
It installs the davfs2 package which can then be used to mount webdav filesystems from the Unraid command line.
See the man pages here for a more complete breakdown of all configuration: https://linux.die.net/man/8/mount.davfs https://linux.die.net/man/5/davfs2.conf
Containers.Requires:
**This plugin is aimed at advanced users** This plugin installs the libraries and binaries required to mount webdav filesystems. The mounting needs to be performed by hand within the Unraid terminal
For example: mount -t davfs http(s)://address:<port>/path /mount/point
See the man pages in the description for more information on mount options.
